meanings.definition: A substance that reduces or eliminates static electricity.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed the antistat on my clothes to prevent static electricity.
meanings.sent2: The antistat in the fabric softener helped reduce static electricity in the laundry.
meanings.sent3: The antistat and static electricity had a dance-off, but the antistat won!
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking was like an antistat, eliminating any static electricity in the room.
meanings.sent5: The antistat worked like magic, making the static electricity disappear instantly.

meanings.definition: A device or material used to prevent the buildup of static electricity.
meanings.sent1: The antistat mat at the entrance helped discharge static electricity from shoes.
meanings.sent2: She used an antistat wristband to prevent static electricity shocks while working.
meanings.sent3: The antistat device hummed happily as it kept static electricity at bay.
meanings.sent4: The antistat material acted like a shield, protecting against static electricity buildup.
meanings.sent5: With the antistat in place, there was no worry about static electricity causing damage.

meanings.definition: To treat or coat with an antistatic substance.
meanings.sent1: I antistated the computer components before assembling them.
meanings.sent2: She carefully antistated the plastic surfaces to prevent static electricity.
meanings.sent3: The magician antistated his gloves, ensuring no static electricity interference during the show.
meanings.sent4: The painter antistated the walls, creating a static-free environment for the artwork.
meanings.sent5: Antistating the floors made the room safe from any static electricity hazards.
